name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in cloud-native systems and infrastructure management using **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and **Ansible**. Adept at developing and deploying applications with a focus on **Infrastructure-as-Code** and **CI/CD** practices, including **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**.
Proficient in modern programming languages such as **JavaScript**, **Go**, and **Ruby**, with a strong command of front-end technologies like **ReactJS**, and back-end frameworks including **Node.js** and **FastAPI**.
Skilled in system design and proactive ownership, ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Passionate about cross-team collaboration and strategic thinking for building high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Experienced with AI and Machine Learning frameworks and tools to enhance predictive analytics and automation in deployed solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented Infrastructure-as-Code solutions using **Terraform** and **Ansible** to automate deployment and manage cloud infrastructure on **AWS** and **Kubernetes** (versions 1.20+), supporting **proactive ownership** principles.
Designed and maintained **CI/CD pipelines** leveraging **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins** for automation and efficiency in code deployment across multiple projects, streamlining release processes by **30%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to architect and develop high-performance applications utilizing **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **DataDog** for real-time data streaming and observability.
Developed scalable data storage solutions utilizing **Amazon RDS** and **Apache Druid** suited for large-scale health and finance applications, achieving a **25%** reduction in query response times.
Led system design activities, crafting microservices architecture that enhanced system reliability and scalability through effective use of **Docker** and orchestrated deployments with **Kubernetes**.
Spearheaded initiatives to refine development workflows that enhanced **cross-team collaboration**, enabling smoother transitions between DevOps and software engineering disciplines.
Utilized advanced JavaScript frameworks including **ReactJS** to create engaging user interfaces and streamline user experiences in financial applications, boosting user engagement metrics by over **40%**.
Engaged in strategic thinking sessions to outline project roadmaps and development strategies, building rapport with stakeholders to ensure alignment on objectives.
Executed advanced data visualization strategies employing **D3.js** and **Chart.js** for real-time insights into application performance, measuring operational KPIs effectively.
Integrated monitoring tools to enhance proactive system ownership, using platforms like **DataDog** to track application health and performance across environments.
Facilitated knowledge sharing and rapport building among team members to foster a cooperative team environment, reducing onboarding time for new engineers by **20%**.

Utilized **AWS** and **Terraform** to implement Infrastructure-as-Code, enabling seamless deployment pipelines and enhancing proactive ownership in development workflows.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins** for efficient code integration and delivery, resulting in a **50%** reduction in deployment time.
Designed and integrated scalable, event-driven architectures using **Apache Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, improving system reliability and communication for **high-volume transactional systems**.
Modernized core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js** (**NestJS**/**Express**) and **Python** (**FastAPI**, **Django**), enhancing scalability and performance.
Built front-end applications with **React** (**18**), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, leveraging **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** for responsive UI design.
Delivered **real-time analytics dashboards** using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing immediate insights into transactions, improving decision-making efficiency by **30%**.
Developed ETL pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** for ingesting and processing financial data from internal and third-party sources.
Created and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection with **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, significantly boosting the detection rate of fraudulent transactions by **40%**.
Established ML pipelines for **real-time credit scoring** and churn prediction, utilizing **MLflow** and **Airflow** for seamless integration into backend services, streamlining operational workflows.

• Demonstrated **proactive ownership** by designing and optimizing backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Python** (**FastAPI**, **Django**) and **Node.js** (**NestJS**, **Express**), ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
• Leveraged **Apache Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** to engineer real-time features through event-driven architecture, facilitating responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking.
• Developed frontend applications using **ReactJS** (**18**), **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, enhanced with **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS**, providing fast, responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.
• Employed **Amazon RDS**, **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage solutions for high-traffic e-commerce workflows, ensuring fault-tolerant data access and performance optimization.
• Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to personalize product offerings and improve conversion rates based on real-time behavioral data.
• Achieved significant performance improvements by implementing **Redis** caching for product metadata, shopping cart sessions, and search results, reducing read pressure on databases by over **30%**.
• Successfully implemented feature flags and managed blue-green deployments using **Kubernetes** namespaces and tools like **LaunchDarkly**, supporting controlled rollouts, A/B testing, and risk mitigation during major updates.
• Created responsive and SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs with **Next.js**, **Vue 3** + **Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, ensuring compliance with accessibility standards (**WCAG 2.1**) and optimizing for mobile-first engagement.
• Established secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, adhering to PCI compliance while managing sensitive data with tokenized transactions.
• Applied **role-based access control (RBAC)** and **OAuth 2.0** for enhanced security, ensuring GDPR compliance and robust user data protection across the platform.
